basics.title: About Me
basics.name: Jhon Colmenares
basics.label: Fullstack Developer with over 10 years of experience in web, mobile, and desktop applications.
basics.summary: I am a Fullstack Developer with over 10 years of experience in the design, development, and implementation of web, mobile, and desktop solutions. I have participated in all stages of the software development lifecycle, from conception and architecture to production deployment. My focus is on creating robust, efficient, and scalable applications using modern technologies such as PHP (CakePHP, Laravel), JavaScript (Node, Angular, Svelte, AlpineJS), Go, and C# (.NET). I excel at leading projects, improving existing systems, and delivering solutions aligned with business objectives.
summaryHighlights: More than 10 projects led from scratch to production
Development experience with a clean architecture approach
Knowledge of deployment on Linux and Windows servers
Integration with AWS services like Lambda and S3
Advanced use of relational and non-relational databases
